greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 0, and for n > 0, a(n+1) = u - v where u (resp. v) is the number of terms equal to a(n) (resp. a(n)+1) among the first n terms.
comment: The sequence has chaotic features (see plot in Links section).
link: Rémy Sigrist, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
